io.github.steviebeenz.nope

Class NOPE

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
      • org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        • io.github.steviebeenz.nope.NOPE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter, org.bukkit.command.TabExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin

    public class NOPE
extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
    NOPE is a 1.15.2 Minecraft Anti-Cheat NOPE relies purely on Dependency Injection and Modularity, get modules with getModule(Class). https://github.com/MSWS/NOPE/wiki
    Author:
    imodm
